properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Boothville LA to Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River out 20 nm; Coastal Waters from Port Fourchon LA to Lower Atchafalaya River LA out 20 nm; Coastal waters from the Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River to Port Fourchon Louisiana out 20 NM
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued March 2 at 3:21PM CST until March 3 at 10:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dense fog will reduce visibility to one mile or less.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Port Fourchon LA to Lower
Atchafalaya River LA out 20 nm, Coastal waters from the
Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River to Port Fourchon
Louisiana out 20 NM and Coastal Waters from Boothville LA to
Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River out 20 nm.

* WHEN...From 3 AM to 10 AM CST Tuesday.
properties.instruction:
If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 10 AM CST TUESDAY
